name: Clowns Aren't Funny
description:
CLOWNS AREN'T FUNNY
A LUDUM DARE 48 SUBMISSION

Mort the Clown has been hired to entertain at a neighborhood boy's birthday party. Upon arriving at the party, Mort finds that the boy has dug himself deep into a hole into his own backyard. A dedicated clown, Mort must brave the depths below in order to give the boy an unforgettable birthday show. Deeper and deeper he goes, Mort finds himself faced with perilous pits, dangerous monsters, and a cruel reflection of his own psyche. Can Mort brave the dark depths of his own mind and find the boy?

CREDITS:
Programmer - Noah Richardson
Artist - Ryan Dixon
Tilesets + Level Designer - Nate Stutte
Music - Joseph Lucas

V1.1:
- Fixes issues with audio mixing
